Key Match Events: Connor Wong hit a home run against Casey Mize with an exit velocity of 97.4 mph
Post-Match Reflections: Casey Mize was disappointed with his outing, but catcher Jake Rogers was optimistic saying 'we'll take that all day'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Casey Mize's fastball velocity was down, averaging 93.8 mph, well below his season average of 95.6 mph
Others: Casey Mize has now started 56 games over four seasons in the big leagues and has a 4.31 career ERA
